alert.note: Alert for Jemez Mountains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:08PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH STRONG WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN CIBOLA, NORTHEASTERN VALENCIA, SOUTHEASTERN SANDOVAL AND BERNALILLO COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM MDT... At 507 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles northeast of Mesita to near Isleta Pueblo. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, Rio Rancho, Corrales, Bernalillo, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Bosque Farms, Peralta, San Ysidro, Mariposa and San Felipe Pueblo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 133 and 171. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 207 and 253. Highway 550 between Mile Markers 1 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Blowing dust associated with thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.

area.areaDesc: Jemez Mountains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands
